title: Playing digital radio using Assistant/routines
content:
I'm trying to set up a routine to automatically play a radio station through the phone speaker. Either:
> The phone tells me Apple Music isn't installed so it can't play (I don't use Apple Music, don't want it, and don't understand why Google would default to it. I can't seem to remove it from the alternative providers list in Music settings); OR
> I tell it to 'ask Simple Radio' to play the FM station, but get bad interference when played through Assistant, which isn't a problem in the Simple Radio app itself; OR
> I manage to get it to use BBC Sounds to open the BBC radio station, but it won't actually *play*, it just displays the station home screen.
I can't find any more options or defaults to tweak. Why can't Assistant open *and play* a web stream of a radio station?
I'm using Pixel 4 with a Pixel Stand.
Thanks for any observations!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
